trans-unit.source: Specifies the security protocols that are supported by the Schannel security package.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Schannel 安全包支持的安全协议。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration defines permissible values for the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.SecurityProtocol%2A> property and specifies the security protocols that are used by instances of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举定义的可能值包括<xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.SecurityProtocol%2A>属性和指定的<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>类</xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>实例使用的安全协议</xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager.SecurityProtocol%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Secure Socket Layer (SSL) 3.0 security protocol.
trans-unit.target: 指定的安全套接字层 (SSL) 3.0 安全协议。

trans-unit.source: SSL 3.0 has been superseded by the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol and is provided for backward compatibility only.
trans-unit.target: SSL 3.0 已被取代由传输层安全 (TLS) 协议，为了向后兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.0 security protocol.
trans-unit.target: 指定传输层安全 (TLS) 1.0 安全协议。

trans-unit.source: TLS assumes that a connection-oriented protocol, typically TCP, is in use.
trans-unit.target: TLS 假定一个面向连接的协议，通常是 TCP，正在使用。

trans-unit.source: The TLS protocol is defined in IETF RFC 2246.
trans-unit.target: IETF RFC 2246 中定义了 TLS 协议。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.1 security protocol.
trans-unit.target: 指定传输层安全 (TLS) 1.1 安全协议。

trans-unit.source: TLS assumes that a connection-oriented protocol, typically TCP, is in use.
trans-unit.target: TLS 假定一个面向连接的协议，通常是 TCP，正在使用。

trans-unit.source: The TLS 1.1 protocol is defined in IETF RFC 4346.
trans-unit.target: IETF RFC 4346 中定义了 TLS 1.1 协议。

trans-unit.source: This value is supported on [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] and later.
Specifies the Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2 security protocol.
trans-unit.target: 指定传输层安全 (TLS) 1.2 安全协议。

trans-unit.source: TLS assumes that a connection-oriented protocol, typically TCP, is in use.
trans-unit.target: TLS 假定一个面向连接的协议，通常是 TCP，正在使用。

trans-unit.source: The TLS 1.2 protocol is defined in IETF RFC 5246.
trans-unit.target: IETF RFC 5246 中定义了 TLS 1.2 协议。

trans-unit.source: This value is supported on [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] and later.
